description:
The Ultra Lite is actually only a pulley sheave, so you'll need an oval carabiner to create the axle upon which it operates. It's a great minimalist design for mountaineers or climbers hauling small packs. However, it is not for use on Tyrolean traverses or organized rescue.

  • Requires a round stock, oval locking carabiner
  • Breaking strength of 16kN, working load of 1kN
  • For ropes up to 13mm
  • For personal emergency use only
name: Petzl Ultralegere Pulley
